task.title: How to find an email in your inbox
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to find the desired mail in your inbox.

prereq.p: You need to know your search criteria.

context.p: You will learn how to find the mail you have searched for.

step.cmd: At the top, in the search box, enter your search criteria.

result.p: You have successfully found your desired mail.

example.p: You can search your inbox for wanted mails.
